Package org.javact.net.rmi

Interface Summary
ClientSideAnswerBackNet Specifies the remote interface of a client-side object, which is in charge of recovering the answer for a client and updating the Future delegate of the MessageWithReply.
CreatorInt CreatorInt.java CreatorInt est l'interface définissant la méthode RMI de création d'acteur distant.
NetActor Specification of a (RMI) actor, with the communication method.
 

Class Summary
ClientSideAnswerBackImpl Remote client-side object, which is in charge of recovering the answer from a server-side object, and updating the reply.
CreateCt *META-COMPONENT-LEVEL* (excepted STD).
Creator Creator est la classe implantant les services offerts par l'interface CreatorInt, c'est à dire la création locale d'acteurs résultant d'une demande, qui peut être distante (RMI).
DecideOn DecideOn est la classe qui détermine la place ou sera créé un acteur.
MoveCt *META-COMPONENT-LEVEL* The standard RMI Move component.
ReceiveCt The receive component of an actor.
SendCt *META-COMPONENT-LEVEL* (excepted STD).
ServerSideAnswerBackImpl Server-side objects in charge of returning a result to a client, in case of client-server-like interaction (MessageWithReply).
